login.title: Login
login.subtitle: Connect to your account
login.formDescription: Enter your credentials to log in
login.description: Enter your credentials to log in
login.usernamePlaceholder: Enter your username, email or phone
login.usernameHelp: Enter your username or email address
login.usernamePhoneHelp: To login with your phone, include the country code (e.g. +33612345678, 0033612345678 or 33612345678)

errors.loginFailed: Login failed. Please check your credentials.
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again in a few moments.
errors.networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection.
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

magicLink.title: Magic Link Login
magicLink.subtitle: Sign in without a password
magicLink.description: Enter your email address and we'll send you a secure login link
magicLink.emailHelp: Enter the email address associated with your account
magicLink.securityNote: For security reasons, the magic link will expire in 1 minute and can only be used once.

success.title: Magic Link Sent!
success.description: Check your email inbox and click the link to sign in instantly.
success.emailSent: Magic link sent! Check your email.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again in about an hour.

checkEmail.title: Check Your Email
checkEmail.description: We've sent you a magic link to sign in
checkEmail.step1: Check your inbox for an email from Meeshy
checkEmail.step2: Click the magic link to sign in instantly
checkEmail.maxRetriesReached: Maximum retry attempts reached. Please use another login method.
checkEmail.spamWarning: Can't find the email? Check your spam or junk folder

blocked.title: Magic Link Temporarily Disabled
blocked.description: You have reached the maximum number of resend attempts.
blocked.useAnotherMethod: Please use another login method (password or other).

validating.title: Verifying Magic Link
validating.description: Please wait while we verify your login link...

error.title: Invalid Magic Link
error.description: This magic link is invalid or has expired
error.hint: Magic links expire after 1 minute and can only be used once.

noToken.title: Missing Magic Link
noToken.description: No magic link token was found. Please request a new one.

requires2fa.title: Two-Factor Authentication Required
requires2fa.description: Your account has two-factor authentication enabled. Please verify your identity.

errors.invalidToken: This magic link is invalid or has expired
errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please request a new magic link.

verify.title: Two-Factor Authentication
verify.subtitle: Verify your identity
verify.enterCode: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
verify.enterBackupCode: Enter one of your backup codes
verify.securityNote: If you've lost access to your authenticator, use a backup code to sign in.
verify.backupCodeUsed: Backup code used. Consider generating new codes in your security settings.

errors.sessionExpired: Session expired. Please log in again.

setup.title: Set Up Two-Factor Authentication
setup.subtitle: Add an extra layer of security to your account
setup.step1Description: Scan this QR code with your authenticator app (Google Authenticator, Authy, etc.)
setup.step2Description: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
setup.manualEntry: Can't scan? Enter this code manually:

backupCodes.title: Backup Codes
backupCodes.description: Save these backup codes in a secure place. Each code can only be used once.
backupCodes.warning: These codes will not be shown again!
backupCodes.regenerateDescription: This will invalidate your existing backup codes.

register.title: Create an account
register.joinConversationDescription: Create your account or sign in if you already have one
register.description: Join Meeshy and communicate without barriers
register.subtitle: Create your Meeshy account
register.formDescription: Fill in the information below to create your account
register.nameInvalidChars: Name must contain at least one letter
register.usernameHelp: This is your pseudonym. Only letters, numbers, hyphens (-) and underscores (_). Used in your profile URL.
register.emailHelp: We will use this email to contact you
register.phoneCountryCodeHelp: Include the country code (e.g. +33, 0033 or 33 for France)
register.passwordHelp: Minimum 6 characters. Use letters, numbers and special characters for better security.
register.systemLanguageHelp: Primary language into which all messages from your contacts will be translated
register.regionalLanguageHelp: Secondary language into which messages from your contacts will be translated
register.fillRequiredFields: Please fill in all required fields

validation.emailInvalid: Please enter a valid email address
validation.passwordTooShort: Password must be at least 6 characters
validation.usernameInvalid: Username can only contain letters, numbers, hyphens (-) and underscores (_), no spaces
validation.phoneTooShort: Phone number must contain at least 8 digits
validation.phoneInvalidFormat: Phone number must contain only digits (prefix + or 00 optional)

errors.phoneExists: This phone number is already registered
errors.serverError: Server error. Please try again in a few moments.
errors.networkError: Network error. Check your internet connection.
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please wait a moment before trying again.
errors.invalidData: Invalid data. Please check the fields.
errors.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms of service and privacy policy
errors.unknownError: An unexpected error occurred. Please try again.

wizard.usernameSubtitle: This is how others will see you
wizard.contactSubtitle: Enter your contact details to verify your account
wizard.preferencesSubtitle: Which languages would you like to communicate in?
wizard.acceptTermsRequired: You must accept the terms to create your account
wizard.emailExists: This email address is already linked to an account
wizard.phoneExists: This phone number is already linked to an account
wizard.bothExist: These details are already linked to an existing account
wizard.emailExistsDesc: An account already exists with this email. Recover it or sign in.
wizard.phoneExistsDesc: An account already exists with this number. Recover it or sign in.
wizard.recoverAccountDescription: An account already exists with this information. Would you like to recover your account?
wizard.guessIdentityDesc: To verify it's you, complete the missing information

joinConversation.title: Join a conversation
joinConversation.description: Enter the conversation link you received
joinConversation.resumeDescription: You have an ongoing conversation. You can resume it or join a new conversation.
joinConversation.ongoingDescription: You have an active conversation that you can resume.
joinConversation.newConversationDescription: Enter a new conversation link below:

createAccount.title: Join the conversation
createAccount.description: Create your account or sign in if you already have one
createAccount.receiveLanguagePlaceholder: In which language do you want to receive messages?

forgotPassword.title: Forgot Password
forgotPassword.subtitle: Reset your password securely
forgotPassword.description: Enter your email address and we will send you a link to reset your password
forgotPassword.emailHelp: Enter the email address associated with your account
forgotPassword.securityNote: For security reasons, we will send a password reset link to your email address. The link will expire in 15 minutes.
forgotPassword.privacyNote: We will never ask for your password via email or phone.

errors.invalidEmail: Please enter a valid email address

checkEmail.title: Check Your Email
checkEmail.description: We have sent a password reset link to your email address
checkEmail.step1: Check your inbox for an email from Meeshy
checkEmail.step2: Click the password reset link in the email
checkEmail.expiry: The reset link will expire in 15 minutes for security
checkEmail.spamWarning: Can't find the email? Check your spam or junk folder

errors.resendFailed: Failed to resend email. Please try again.
errors.dailyLimitReached: You have reached the limit of 3 requests per day. Please try again tomorrow.

phoneReset.title: Reset by Phone
phoneReset.description: Enter your phone number to recover your account
phoneReset.phoneHelp: Enter the number associated with your account
phoneReset.identityDescription: We found an account associated with this number. For security, please confirm your identity.

errors.userNotFound: No account found with this number
errors.phoneNotVerified: This number is not verified on your account
errors.identityMismatch: Username or email does not match
errors.maxAttemptsReached: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.smsSendFailed: Failed to send SMS. Please try again.
errors.invalidCode: Invalid code. Please check and try again.
errors.codeExpired: The code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again later.

resetPassword.title: Reset Password
resetPassword.subtitle: Create a new secure password
resetPassword.description: Enter your new password below. Make sure it is strong and secure.
resetPassword.twoFactorHelp: Enter the 6-digit code from your authenticator app
resetPassword.tokenVerified: Identity verified. Please enter your new password.
resetPassword.tokenExpiredHelp: Your reset link may have expired. Please request a new one.
resetPassword.securityTip1: Use a unique password that you have not used before
resetPassword.securityTip2: We recommend using a password manager to generate and store secure passwords

requirements.title: Password must contain
requirements.creativeTip: Be creative, so you don't cry about hacking tomorrow!
requirements.special: ðŸ’¡ Add a special character for rock-solid security?
requirements.specialMet: ðŸŽ‰ Awesome! Rock-solid password with that special character!
requirements.allMet: All requirements met! Your password is secure.

errors.invalidLinkDescription: The password reset link is invalid or missing
errors.noToken: No reset token found in the URL. Please use the link from your email.
errors.noTokenHelp: Please click the reset link from the email we sent you, or request a new password reset.

phoneReset.title: Reset by Phone
phoneReset.description: Enter your phone number associated with your account
phoneReset.phoneHelp: Enter the number associated with your account
phoneReset.identityDescription: Confirm your identity to receive an SMS code

errors.userNotFound: No account found with this number
errors.phoneNotVerified: This number is not verified on your account
errors.usernameInvalid: Username must be between 2 and 30 characters
errors.identityMismatch: Username or email does not match
errors.maxAttemptsExceeded: Too many failed attempts. Please try again later.
errors.smsSendFailed: Failed to send SMS. Please try again.
errors.invalidCode: Invalid code. Please check and try again.
errors.codeExpired: The code has expired. Please request a new one.
errors.rateLimited: Too many attempts. Please try again later.
errors.internalError: An error occurred. Please try again.
